it.unipi.ing.mim.facedetection

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipi.ing.mim.facedetection.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility functions used for the face detection.

    • Method Detail

      • getCanvas

        public static org.bytedeco.javacv.CanvasFrame getCanvas(int width,
                                                        int height,
                                                        java.lang.String title)
        Generates a canvas frame of the specified dimensions and the specified title.
        Parameters:
        width - is the width of the canvas frame to generate
        height - is the height of the canvas frame to generate
        title - is the text to be set as title of the canvas
        Returns:
        a canvas frame of the specified dimensions

      • getImageROI

        public static org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat getImageROI(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat img,
                                                               org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Rect face,
                                                               float padding)
        Returns a squared Mat image containing the specified face, cropped from the specified image, accordingly to the padding.
        Parameters:
        img - is the source image from which the face needs to be taken
        face - is the Rect representing the face inside the image
        padding - is a number representing the percentage of padding w.r.t. the longest side of the face rectangle

      • face2File

        public static java.io.File face2File(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat imgROI,
                                     java.io.File outFile)
        Saves the specified image as the specified file.
        Parameters:
        imgROI - is the image to be saved
        outFile - is the file that will contain the image
        Returns:
        the created file
